title: How to Make a Basil Berry Martini Cocktail

steps.headline: Chill the martini glass.
steps.description: Fill martini glass with ice or put it to the freezer and add some water

steps.headline: Put some basil leaves into mixing glass.
Muddle.
steps.description: Muddle the basil leaves to release their flavour.

steps.headline: Add strawberries and muddle them just like basil leaves.
Add 1 teaspoon of strawberry syrup and 4 teaspoons of Strawberry liqueur
Add ground black pepper and stir the mixture
Fill the rest of the glass with ice

text: Chill the martini glass. Fill martini glass with ice or put it to the freezer and add some water Put some basil leaves into mixing glass. Three or four is fine. Muddle. Muddle the basil leaves to release their flavour. Add strawberries and muddle them just like basil leaves.  Add 50 ml of vodka.  Add 1 teaspoon of strawberry syrup and 4 teaspoons of Strawberry liqueur  Add ground black pepper and stir the mixture  Add 1 teaspoon of cranberry juice  Fill the rest of the glass with ice
